original_text: But as for you, you should give birth to many children so that you become very many people. There will be many people and they will live all over the earth.’
korean_text: 너희는 생육하고 번성하며 땅에 가득하여 그 중에서 번성하라 하셨더라

sentences.original_text: you should give birth to many children
so that you become very many people
and they will live all over the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들은 온 땅에 살 것입니다
